feature.label: Multiple Repository Code Search
feature.description:
The ServiceNow Code Search plugin provides the ability to search for keywords across all of the repositories that contribute to the ServiceNow product.
Release 1.0.9: - Added ability to import psf files from the search result
Release 1.0.4: - Fixed read timeout for large searches (for real this time!)
Release 1.0.3: - Show Import Project error in a dialog for better feedback to user
Release 1.0.2: - Added context menus to search result items - All types: - "Info..." show information about the search result item - Repository - "Clone Repository" clone repository and add to workspace - "Add Repository" add existing local repository to workspace - Project - "Import Project" import project into workspace (clone the repository if necessary) - File - ...actions coming... - Significant speed improvements for search results - Fixed (some) issues with large search results causing error and not returning results Remaining issues: - ssh passphrase can be entered on the Preferences page, but it is not used - the help text on the Preferences page does not scroll, so you have to resize the dialog to see all of the text - still seeing Read Timeout issues on large searches
